Ad Text:
Are you a Power BI expert who loves transforming data into stories that drive real business impact?


This well know utilities organisation are seeking a Senior Power BI Specialist to join a forward-thinking team using data to shape customer experience, billing performance, and service delivery.

Key activities

Design impactful, self-service dashboards that turn complex data into actionable insight.
Build and maintain robust Power BI models using DAX, Power Query, and Azure data services.
Translate business needs into intuitive analytics solutions across customer, billing, and sales domains.
Collaborate with data engineers and business leaders to deliver trusted, high-quality insights.
Champion data storytelling, upskill users, and drive adoption of BI across the business.

Skills and experience

Deep Power BI expertise, including DAX, modelling, and performance optimisation.
Hands-on experience with Azure Data Services (Data Factory, Synapse, Databricks).
A knack for turning complexity into clarity and communicating insights that matter.
Experience integrating data from systems like Salesforce, billing, or ERP platforms.

Apply now to secure an interview or contact Josh D'Monte on 0401 817 025 for a confidential discussion.
